nodes.text: Person X buys a new house
Person X has connections to a competitor company
Person X has access to his/her company's new products
If someone buys a new house and has connections to competitor company and has access to to his/her company's new products, then he/she is committing corporate espionage
Person X is committing corporate espionage

nodes.scheme: New house, connections to competitors, access to new products - corporate espionage
CQ: Is this evidence enough to prove corporate espionage?
